author: Pat Price
title: Pat Price
text: I would recommend Banggood to everyone. I've ordered several items and although delivery time is longer than usual the items do arrive. My first order arrived within 6 weeks from ordering. However my last order did not arrive in that time period so I panicked a little. I e-mailed Banggood costumer service department and received a reply apologizing for the delay .I could see on my account page that this order was sent out some 8 weeks preciously but unfortunately international orders can not be tracked once they leave the U.S. Banggood immediately offered to resend my order placing trust in me to either return the resend item if I eventually received my original order in the mean time . This is something I never experience from any company before. This is fantastic service and I will be doing business long into the future. I will be encouraging all my friends to shop with Banggood. Well done and thanks to Sunshine.
